attributes.additional_details:
11 years after sending British troops to war in Iraq on fabricated and downright deceitful lies, Tony Blair continues to profess his innocence in this tawdry affair and is even now calling for more military action from the West to act on the forces tearing this once proud country apart because of the power vacuum left behind after the removal of Saddam Hussein.
It is now time for Parliament to show that it's allegiance is with the people of Britain and not to a deluded ex-Prime Minister, and to regain some of the respect we once held in the eyes of the rest of the world.
Impeach Tony Blair, and once and for all lay to rest the humiliation and damaged reputation of this country, and regain some credibility once more.
